about_the_game:
Use the skills to attack (or being counter-attacked by) the enemies, and defeat the boss.
Control Ely, Astra, and Jennifer to hunt down their long-term frienemy - Exo, uncover the traitor - Dreyar, and defeat the ultimate Exo - red.

You are not going in grids, but moving freely. Walk, Run, or Sprint to any movable place and attack your enemies with Gun/Sword/Shield.
Gun/Sword/Shield skills are long/mid/short ranged, while Gun skill can break Sword skill, Sword skill can break Shield skill, and Shield skill can counter-attack Gun skill. Choose your next move wisely!
detailed_description:
Use the skills to attack (or being counter-attacked by) the enemies, and defeat the boss.
Control Ely, Astra, and Jennifer to hunt down their long-term frienemy - Exo, uncover the traitor - Dreyar, and defeat the ultimate Exo - red.

You are not going in grids, but moving freely. Walk, Run, or Sprint to any movable place and attack your enemies with Gun/Sword/Shield.
Gun/Sword/Shield skills are long/mid/short ranged, while Gun skill can break Sword skill, Sword skill can break Shield skill, and Shield skill can counter-attack Gun skill. Choose your next move wisely!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Mixing Ammos

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A turn-based free-move strategy game. Walk/Run/Sprint freely without the grids. Your attack could be countered so choose your next move wisely.
